metadata.dc:author: Oliver, F
López Alvarez-Buhilla, P
Bernal, C
Yáñez, J M
Alfonso, L
Torres, C
metadata.dc:description: Rupture of the bladder and posterior urethra is a serious complication of pelvis fracture. From 1972 to 1984, 61 patients were admitted for genitourinary injuries. We present a review of 5 cases of bladder and urethral posterior injuries associated with pelvic fractures. We assess some current issues in the treatment and diagnosis.
metadata.dc:title: Traumatismos vesicouretrales en pacientes con fracturas pélvicas.
[Vesico-urethral injuries in patients with pelvic fractures].
